message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is generous and saves us both time.
I understand you wanting the lions share Alice, but I need to be able to live too. This offer is fair.
The clock is ticking, Bob.  This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer before inflation eats away at any potential gains for me!
Bob, let's be realistic. Take this offer before inflation makes it even worse for you!
